name: Real Dunk Basketball Games
description:
The sports game fans should have this best basketball game in their phones! The pleasant time killer will engaged you more and more by its addictive gameplay and entertaining matches against thought rivals!
Play the matches against all champions sides of the world, this isn’t be easy bit practice makes a man perfect so you have the practice mode there in the game.
The detailed models and 3D animations will feels you like you are on the basketball court and playing against your rival in world tournament. Do classic dunks and block your rival to point, hold the ball and do skills, pass the ball in gaps and shoot from long range!
Here is all what a basketball game lover wants, just get into the game and be ready for world class teams in the championship!

Features:
- Full Court Play
- Detailed stadium having crowed
- Smooth gameplay
- Realistic animations and skills
- Different shots
- Many teams to choose in
- 4 game modes
- Knockout tournaments
- Daily Rewards
